biocontainers.name: nudup
biocontainers.summary: Marks/removes duplicate molecules based on the molecular tagging technology used in nugen products.

biotools.summary: Marks/removes duplicate molecules based on the molecular tagging technology used in Tecan products.

galaxy.summary: Marks/removes PCR introduced duplicate molecules based on the molecular tagging technology used in NuGEN products.
galaxy.bio_tools_summary: Marks/removes duplicate molecules based on the molecular tagging technology used in Tecan products.
